img.alt: File:Flag of India.svg

div.p: Flag_of_India.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,350 × 900 pixels, file size: 849 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

a.title: This image, included in a high-risk template or message, is indefinitely protected from editing to prevent vandalism.

img.alt: Page permanently protected
FIAV 111000.svg

tr.td:
flag has 3 horizontal stripes
flag contains symbol: Dharma-chakra

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.span: Flag of India.svg
td.div: English: The Flag of India. The colours are saffron, white and green. The navy blue wheel in the center of the flag has a diameter approximately the width of the white band and is called Ashoka's Dharma Chakra, with 24 spokes (after Ashoka, the Great). Each spoke depicts one hour of the day, portraying the prevalence of righteousness all 24 hours of it.

span.b: မြန်မာဘာသာ:

span.style: font-family:Padauk, Parabaik, Myanmar3, Myanmar2, Myanmar1, MyMyanmar

div.span: အိန္ဒိယနိုင်ငံ၏ အလံတော်

td.div: 日本語: インドの国旗

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: Self-made, based from ISI 1:1968 Specification for the national flag of India (cotton khadi)

false

img.alt: Public domain

td.i: This work is in the public domain in India because its term of copyright has expired.

ul.li: The Indian Copyright Act applies in India, to works first published in India.

According to The Indian Copyright Act, 1957 (Chapter V Section 25), Anonymous works, photographs, cinematographic works, sound recordings, government works, and works of corporate authorship or of international organizations enter the public domain 60 years after the date on which they were first published, counted from the beginning of the following calendar year (ie. as of 2010, works published prior to 1 January 1950 are considered public domain). Posthumous works (other than those above) enter the public domain after 60 years from publication date. Any other kind of work enters the public domain 60 years after the author's death. Text of laws, judicial opinions, and other government reports are free from copyright.

td.small: This file may not be in the public domain outside India. The creator and year of publication are essential information and must be provided. See Wikipedia:Public domain and Wikipedia:Copyrights for more details.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:56, 14 July 2010

td.span: (http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=File:Flag_of_India_ISI_1.svg)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:53, 19 April 2010

td.span: (Finally got my hands on ISI 1:1968. The colors are in CIE 1931, so that will take a while to solve. However, this is what I got from the construction provided. Markup in Size 7 for the flag.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:44, 2 April 2010

td.span: (The 1.1 declaration broke the validation, but I took it out so it all works now. Try it, trust me on that one.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:40, 2 April 2010

td.span: (svg 1.1 cannot start as numbers for id's, it must be text (now Zach, don't break all of Wikimedia again))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:30, 2 April 2010

td.span: (the data sheet has SVG v 1.0 in the text, the checker is 1.1)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:29, 2 April 2010

td.span: (Compressing more code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:30, 2 April 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 17:01, 1 April 2010 flag was drawn wrong anyways)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:46, 1 April 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 08:35, 1 April 2010 the code doesn't validate and is therefore incorrect. Validity takes precedence over 3k of code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:01, 1 April 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 20:42, 19 November 2009 validation of the code is not a concern, added a lot of bloated code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:35, 1 April 2010

td.span: (== Summary == Correct SVG errors that wouldn't allow validation of the code )

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:42, 19 November 2009

td.span: (Compress code, realized that the middle blue disc was missing for a while...oops)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:34, 3 October 2009

td.span: (From downloadable files at http://india.gov.in/myindia/images/flag1.gif (Safron is still not legally defined when it comes to what it does look like, but the Government of India has flag images we can download and use).)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:03, 2 October 2009

td.span: (The top clour, is Saffron and not orange.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:48, 20 December 2008

td.span: (Working on the wheel)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:44, 20 December 2008

td.span: ( reworked the flag on the official image at http://india.gov.in/myindia/images/flag1.eps)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:39, 21 September 2007

td.span: (Honey, I broke the image)
(Reverted to version as of 06:31, 9 February 2006)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:52, 15 September 2007

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 23:54, 24 March 2006)
(Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:14, 25 March 2006

td.span: (Wheel slightly improved. Colors changed according to http://fotw.vexillum.com/flags/in.html#colour)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:54, 24 March 2006

td.span: (File re-coded by hand. File size significantly reduced. More saturated orange. Used [http://homepage.mac.com/gratitude/PeacePath__Flags_Data/IndiaF.gif this] as a template.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:31, 9 February 2006

td.span: (did some little compression, I will try to do more later)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:50, 30 December 2005

td.span: (Saved it as a simple SVG file)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:11, 28 November 2005

td.span: (Modified colours as per the old png version)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:31, 16 October 2005

td.span: (Compression)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:30, 10 October 2005

td.span: (I have changed the colors and the central emblem to match http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:India_flag_large.png.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:58, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of India. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of India)
